detail_desc: Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Spotted fishnet tights with an elasticated waist.
Thin tights with a floral pattern, elasticated waist and reinforced toes.
Thin tights with a spot pattern and an elasticated waist.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a collar, V-neck opening at the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Concealed buttons down the front, 3/4-length, cuffed sleeves and a seam and detachable tie belt at the waist. Pockets in the side seams and high slits in the sides. Unlined.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a collar, V-neck opening at the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Concealed buttons down the front, 3/4-length, cuffed sleeves and a seam and detachable tie belt at the waist. Pockets in the side seams and high slits in the sides. Unlined.

Short-sleeved shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke at the back and rounded hem. Bow tie in a patterned weave with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch cotton denim with hard-worn details in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Knee-length skirt in a crêpe weave with a high waist and sewn-in wrapover at the front. Concealed zip in one side and a flounce trim down the front and around the hem. Unlined.
Knee-length skirt in a crêpe weave with a high waist and sewn-in wrapover at the front. Concealed zip in one side and a flounce trim down the front and around the hem. Unlined.
Scarf in patterned satin. Size 110x110 cm.
Scarf in patterned satin. Size 110x110 cm.

Oversized jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Chest pockets, patch front pockets and a seam at the waist with a concealed drawstring.
5-pocket shorts in stretch cotton twill. Slightly looser fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide legs.
5-pocket shorts in stretch cotton twill. Slightly looser fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide legs.
5-pocket shorts in stretch cotton twill. Slightly looser fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and wide legs.

Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a text print and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a text print and reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins). Jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Hat in braided paper straw.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with an adjustable hook and loop strap over the foot. Linings and insoles in a cotton weave, and patterned soles with a good grip.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with an adjustable hook and loop strap over the foot. Linings and insoles in a cotton weave, and patterned soles with a good grip.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with an adjustable hook and loop strap over the foot. Linings and insoles in a cotton weave, and patterned soles with a good grip.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, concealed zip down the back and long, wide puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Frill-trimmed seam at the waist and a softly draping skirt. Longer at the back. Partly lined.
Short wrapover dress in a crisp weave with a V-neck, raglan puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and flared skirt with a wide flounced trim at the hem. Lined.
V-neck top in cool satin with lace at the top, spaghetti shoulder straps and a lace racer back with covered buttons.
V-neck top in cool satin with lace at the top, spaghetti shoulder straps and a lace racer back with covered buttons.
V-neck top in cool satin with lace at the top, spaghetti shoulder straps and a lace racer back with covered buttons.
Skirt in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and patch front pockets. Unlined.

Skirt in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and patch front pockets. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.

Dress in a patterned viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist, and side pockets. Unlined.

Dress in a patterned viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist, and side pockets. Unlined.

Dress in a patterned viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist, and side pockets. Unlined.

Sleeveless dress in airy, patterned chiffon with flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back. Small opening with a button at the back of the neck, a seam with narrow elastication at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined.

Sleeveless dress in tulle with narrow shoulder straps, a sequined bodice and a zip at the back. Gathered seam at the waist and a super-flared skirt in several layers of tulle, the top layer with sequined shell appliqués. Lined.
Top in patterned sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-style T-shirt in cotton jersey with an all-over print at the top, over the sleeves and back. Narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Lace bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Lace bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Lace bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with long raglan sleeves, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with long raglan sleeves, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Top in soft cotton jersey with a narrow rib trim around the neckline, print motif on the front, cap sleeves and cut fringes at the hem.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a narrow rib trim around the neckline, print motif on the front, cap sleeves and cut fringes at the hem.

Slim-fit jeans in soft, washed denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud and fake front and back pockets. Legs with flap pockets and straight hems. Detachable, elastic braces with imitation leather details.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a yoke and cap sleeves in lace. V-neck, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, and a narrow elasticated seam under the bust. Jersey lining.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a yoke and cap sleeves in lace. V-neck, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, and a narrow elasticated seam under the bust. Jersey lining.

Short, fitted pencil skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, narrow, detachable belt and a concealed zip at the back. Lined. The polyester content of the outer fabric is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.

Short, fitted pencil skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, narrow, detachable belt and a concealed zip at the back. Lined. The polyester content of the outer fabric is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.

Short, fitted pencil skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, narrow, detachable belt and a concealed zip at the back. Lined. The polyester content of the outer fabric is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.

Short, fitted pencil skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, narrow, detachable belt and a concealed zip at the back. Lined. The polyester content of the outer fabric is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.
Boxy-style top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with short sleeves, a narrow trim around the neckline and rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Platform sandals with a braided jute trim around the soles and narrow suede straps that cross over the foot and tie around the ankle. Rubber soles. Platform front approx. 3.5 cm. Heel 5 cm.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.

Shopper in braided paper straw with two wooden handles at the top and a narrow, detachable shoulder strap in imitation leather with a carabiner hook at each end. One zipped inner compartment and a sturdy base in imitation leather. Lined. Depth 14 cm. Height 29 cm. Width 37 cm.

Shopper in braided paper straw with two wooden handles at the top and a narrow, detachable shoulder strap in imitation leather with a carabiner hook at each end. One zipped inner compartment and a sturdy base in imitation leather. Lined. Depth 14 cm. Height 29 cm. Width 37 cm.

Large shopper in cotton canvas with imitation leather details. Two imitation leather handles with studs at the top and narrow, decorative imitation leather straps at the sides. One large inner compartment and imitation suede inside. Unlined. No fasteners. Depth 22.5 cm. Height 35 cm. Width 63 cm.
Shopper in a jute and cotton blend with two handles at the top and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. The cotton content of the shopper is organic.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a deep V-neck, long trumpet sleeves and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist with a peplum and detachable belt.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a deep V-neck, long trumpet sleeves and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist with a peplum and detachable belt.
Jumper in a purl-knit cotton blend with a round neckline and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Fully lined, batik-patterned swimsuit with narrow, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps and flounces at the sides of the legs. The polyester content of the swimsuit is recycled.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and diagonal side pockets. Wide jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and diagonal side pockets. Wide jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details at the hem and short raglan sleeves with reflective details. Slightly longer at the back.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details at the hem and short raglan sleeves with reflective details. Slightly longer at the back.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details at the hem and short raglan sleeves with reflective details. Slightly longer at the back.

Soft, non-wired bra in jersey made from a modal blend. Adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and wide elastic at the hem.

Soft, non-wired bra in jersey made from a modal blend. Adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and wide elastic at the hem.

Imitation suede sandals with straps over the foot, a heel strap and lacing at the front. Imitation leather linings and insoles and finely fluted soles. The polyester content of the sandals is partly recycled.

Imitation suede sandals with straps over the foot, a heel strap and lacing at the front. Imitation leather linings and insoles and finely fluted soles. The polyester content of the sandals is partly recycled.

Blouse in a crinkled cotton weave with a unique nursing feature. Round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.

Blouse in a crinkled cotton weave with a unique nursing feature. Round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
